using UnityEngine;
using XNodeEditor;

[CustomNodeEditor(typeof(#SCRIPTNAME#))]
public class #SCRIPTNAME#Editor : NodeEditor 
{
	private #SCRIPTNAME# node;
    
	public override void OnCreate()
	{
        	//onUpdateNode += (n)=> (n as #SCRIPTNAME#).[SOME_METHOD];
	}

    	public override void OnBodyGUI() 
	{
        if (node == null) node = target as #SCRIPTNAME#;

        // Update serialized object's representation
        serializedObject.Update();

        NodeEditorGUILayout.PropertyField(serializedObject.FindProperty("propertyName"));

        //if (GUILayout.Button(new GUIContent("ButtonName")));
        //EditorGUILayout.LabelField(new GUIContent(texture2d), GUILayout.Width(180), GUILayout.Height(180));

        // Apply property modifications
        serializedObject.ApplyModifiedProperties();
    }
}
